client_terms.body_1: "We" refers to the application that connects clients with event service providers. "You" refers to the user, whether a client or a service provider.
client_terms.body_2: The app allows users to browse, filter, and book services such as venues, catering, decoration, photography, transportation, and more — all in one place.
client_terms.body_3: You must provide accurate information when creating an account and are responsible for any activity under your account.
client_terms.body_4: Misuse of the app, including posting offensive or misleading content, is prohibited. Please respect all users.
client_terms.body_5: The app facilitates booking tools, but the final agreement is between you and the service provider. We are not responsible for any disputes.
client_terms.body_6: We only provide the platform and do not guarantee the quality of services. Any issues are between the user and the provider.
client_terms.body_7: Policies vary by provider. Please review them before confirming your booking.
client_terms.body_8: We reserve the right to update the terms at any time. You will be notified of significant changes through the app.
client_terms.body_9: To reach us, please use the "Support" section within the app.

home.question:
What do you
 want to book today?

provider_terms.body_1: The term "we" refers to the application that connects event service providers with clients. The term "you" refers to the service provider registered on the platform.
provider_terms.body_2: The app provides a platform to showcase your services and receive booking requests from clients in areas such as venues, hospitality, decoration, photography, transportation, and more.
provider_terms.body_3: You must provide accurate and up-to-date information about your business. You are fully responsible for the content you publish and the bookings you accept.
provider_terms.body_4: You are required to deliver the listed services with quality and professionalism. Publishing misleading or false information is prohibited, and cancellations without valid reasons are not allowed.
provider_terms.body_5: Clients make bookings through the app, and you are responsible for fulfilling the service as agreed. The app is not a party to payments or any financial disputes.
provider_terms.body_6: You are responsible for the quality of services provided. Any complaints or disputes with clients must be handled directly and transparently.
provider_terms.body_7: You must clearly state your cancellation and refund policies in your profile. Adhering to these policies is essential to maintain trust with clients and the platform.
provider_terms.body_8: We may update these terms from time to time. You will be notified of any significant changes via the app or email.
provider_terms.body_9: For any inquiries or issues regarding the use of the platform, please contact us through the "Support" section in the app.

privacy_policy.body_1: We collect information you voluntarily provide, such as your name, phone number, email address, and location when you register or use our services.
privacy_policy.body_2: We use your information to provide and improve our services, personalize your experience, communicate with you, and send notifications related to bookings or important updates.
privacy_policy.body_3: We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties without your consent, except when required by law or to enhance the service through trusted service providers.
privacy_policy.body_4: We are committed to protecting your data using appropriate technical and organizational measures to prevent unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
privacy_policy.body_5: We may collect technical data such as device type, operating system, and usage statistics to improve app performance and user experience. We do not use unnecessary or intrusive tracking tools.
privacy_policy.body_6: You can edit or delete your personal information through the account settings. You may also request permanent account deletion via the support section in the app.
privacy_policy.body_7: We may update this policy from time to time. You will be notified of any significant changes via the app or your registered email.
privacy_policy.body_8: For any questions or requests related to this privacy policy, please contact us through the 'Support' section within the app.
